gladosPackage

Class OutputNeuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • gladosPackage.AbstractNeuron
      • gladosPackage.OutputNeuron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OutputNeuron
extends AbstractNeuron
    An output neuron for a neural network. Uses an inputLayer but no outputLayer, otherwise works exactly like an IntermediateNeuron.
    Author:
    Laty
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Applies the variation of learning rate to every weight of this neuron following a specific law.
